original_text: All your friends have turned away from you. They do not want to help you in your troubles. I have hurt you, in the way that an enemy might attack you. You have lived in a very wicked way, and you are guilty of many sins. So I had to punish you, to teach you what is right. All your friends have turned away from you.
korean_text: 너를 사랑하던 자가 다 너를 잊고 찾지 아니하니 이는 네 악행이 많고 네 죄가 많기 때문에 나는 네 원수가 당할 고난을 네가 받게 하며 잔인한 징계를 내렸도다

sentences.original_text: All your friends have turned away from you.
They do not want to help you in your troubles.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 곤경에서 너를 돕고 싶어하지 않는다.

sentences.original_text: in the way that an enemy might attack you.
sentences.korean_translation: 원수가 너를 공격할 수 있는 방식으로.

sentences.original_text: You have lived in a very wicked way
and you are guilty of many sins.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 많은 죄에 대해 유죄하다.

sentences.original_text: So I had to punish you
to teach you what is right.
All your friends have turned away from you.
